list.title: Horoscope Module
list.description: author: Chris Kim date: 06/07/2023 The horoscope display shows the reading based on the user's zodi

list.title: Starting JSDocs
list.description: JSDocs generates html style documentation based on block comments (describing the function) and tut

list.title: Questionaire Module
list.description: author: Chris Kim date: 06/07/2023 The questionaire is a simple form to retreive user name and birt

list.title: TarotDisplay Module
list.description: author: Chris Kim date: 06/07/2023 The TarotDisplay is an important part of the Tarot Card function

list.title: module:Horoscope
list.description: This file contains the functions related to the horoscope feature

list.title: module:Horoscope~adjustIndexForHorroscope
list.description:
returns the index corresponding to the sign in the horoscope.JSON
                 file based on the input user birthday, using the hardcoded
                 date values. The following is how signs are selected:
                 Aries (March 21 – April 19)
                 Taurus (April 20 – May 20)
                 Gemini (May 21 – June 20)
                 Cancer (June 21 – July 22)
                 Leo (July 23 – August 22)
                 Virgo (August 23 – September 22)
                 Libra (September 23 – October 22)
                 Scorpio (October 23 – November 21)
                 Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21)
                 Capricorn (December 22 – January 19)
                 Aquarius (January 20 – February 18)
                 Pisces (February 19 – March 20)

list.title: module:Horoscope~concentricGradient
list.description: Slowly fades in closer and closer

list.title: module:Horoscope~goHome
list.description: Changes the location of the window to the home page

list.title: module:Horoscope~init
list.description:
An init function used to fetch horoscope.json file and set up the home page
event listener behavior. Exit code 1 if successful, 0 if not.

list.title: module:Horoscope~outputHoroscope
list.description: A horoscope reading is outputted based on the input name and birthday

list.title: module:Horoscope~pulseRedOverlay
list.description: Responsible for pulses on overlay div for the blood screen affect

list.title: module:Horoscope~shake
list.description: Shakes the body by translating X and rotating

list.title: module:Horoscope~timer
list.description: A timer event that triggers all time based events

list.title: module:Questionnaire
list.description: This file contains the functions for the Horoscope Questionnaire

list.title: module:Questionnaire~init
list.description: An init function that starts up templates

list.title: module:Questionnaire~initNameBirth
list.description: Initalizes the name and birthday Question

list.title: module:Questionnaire~parseNumbers
list.description: A function that parses the input of all numbers

list.title: module:Questionnaire~showContent
list.description:
Goes through all the questions in the questionnaire, displaying the questions one after another
                 based on when the user clicks the continue button.

list.title: module:TarotCardForm~initQuesetions
list.description:
This function initializes the variables used to store the user
answers to the name and reading category questions in the Tarot form page

list.title: module:TarotCardForm~parseNumbers
list.description: Parses our numbers from name input

list.title: module:TarotDisplay
list.description:
Fetches the Tarot Card Answer.
Returns 0 if error, 1 if successfully load tarot card descriptions.
Appends image corresponding to the selected tarot card.

list.title: module:TarotDisplay~goHome
list.description: Exits back to main

list.title: module:TarotDisplay~revealCard
list.description: Reveals Card by flipping the tarot card image and displaying meaning on the bottom row.

list.title: TransitionCanvas
list.description:
Creates an instance of TransitionCanvas and creates a reference
to the audio element.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#attributeChangedCallback
list.description:
If the sfx attribute were to be changed via script, this lifecycle callback
will change the sfx of the audio element linked to this transition-canvas.
Convenient for development using this canvas.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#connectedCallback
list.description:
Upon attaching the element to the DOM, determine the duration of the transition from the attached attribute.
Also, assign the linked audio element its source based on the sfx attribute. Finally,
play only the first frame of the animation, so that something can appear on the screen.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#fadeIn
list.description: Animation for fading from black to the full scene

list.title: TransitionCanvas#playAnim
list.description: Generic animation player.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#playSfx
list.description: Induces the linked audio element to play the referenced sound effect.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#transitionIn
list.description:
Initiates the transition in animation. This plays immediately upon the canvas being connected
to the DOM.
